Sending Email To Lisa??? Read This First!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): FAQ (Required Reading!): Sending Email To Lisa??? Read This First!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, June 23, 2002 - 12:04 pm:

I am getting multiple emails from at least 3 people a week who live in the UK, yet insist they own MR1. This has become an extremely annoying situation.

Please be aware that I do not have tons of secret info that is not posted on the site. If I know about it, it is posted. I cannot add much, if anything via email.

I don't have unlimited time to spoon-feed people via email the info we already worked hard on posting here, and run the site, and have a full-time job. Posting messages at MRM is really the preferred method for getting promt game assistance -if there is a topic not already posted here.

I expect people to have read the FAQS thoroughly and completely before corresponding with me. -Not just say they read it, actually take a few hours of time and get to know the information well.

There are warnings all over this Archive and the MR2 section, clearly stating that the game called "Monster Rancher" in the UK is actually MR2. There is info on how to distinguish which game you are playing in the:
MR1 Archive: FAQ: Frequently Asked Questions: A Beginner's Guide
and, in the:
MR1 Archive: FAQ: PAL User Urgent Message, If You Live In England, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, etc. READ THIS BEFORE DOING ANYTHING ON THIS SITE!

I no longer wish to receive argumentative emails insisting players own MR1, but there's no Taffy. -Or that the Dinos are sometimes called Zuums. It's a huge waste of my time, and the authors'.

If you insist on sending me such emails, be warned that the you will not be granted a posting account, and I will simply delete the messages without wasting my time replying.
